title: The Eminence in The Dungeon
text: The apprentice starts to receiveth goosebumps as the dark'r pow'r immense and strengthens, the h'ro is still following lights.. what shall thee doth?

buttons.text: You saying to the party, 'please wait i found a dead body i am scared'
You do absolutly nothing as you believe the hero can handle such a weak creature.
You shout to the party 'is this a girl?' while they turn, you swifly rushes to the minotaur kills him by vaporising him, coming back and saying 'ahh never mind its just a firefly'
